SEARCH
Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_proceedings.model.conference

Class Conference

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_proceedings.model.conference.Conference
public class Conference extends Object
Represents a conference in the WolfProceedings system. A conference contains sessions and accepted items (proceedings) and provides operations to manage them.
Author:
Vamsi Gaddipati
